release dates: USA::30 April 2018                            (New York City, New York)

-1.title: Adult: Pilot
-1.plot: Clementine (19) has just broken up with her sort-of-boyfriend, Liam, a sad sack artist who only cares about himself. Her friend, Allison (29), has, yet again, just experienced classic office sexism. They meet in a cafe and recount their experiences in horrific detail.

imdb.plot outline: Clementine (19) and Allison (29), are close friends with a ten year age gap. A painfully honest art school drop out, Clementine wants to lose her virginity, just not to that sad sack Liam, the only guy she knows currently up for the job. Successful and direct, Allison is somehow just as clueless as Clementine. She's killing it at her job despite office sexism, but feels unsure about being single in her late 20s and decidedly unsure about how to change that. In these 10 minute episodes these women help each other through awkward encounters with peers and love interests, offering perspectives from both sides of the millennial divide. Together, they find a respect and loyalty that neither has experienced before.
imdb.title: Adult
plot: Two unlikely friends with a ten year age gap, Clementine and Allison, face problems from the harsh, judgmental world, and find solace in their weird but loving friendship.

Clementine (19) and Allison (29), are close friends with a ten year age gap. A painfully honest art school drop out, Clementine wants to lose her virginity, just not to that sad sack Liam, the only guy she knows currently up for the job. Successful and direct, Allison is somehow just as clueless as Clementine. She's killing it at her job despite office sexism, but feels unsure about being single in her late 20s and decidedly unsure about how to change that. In these 10 minute episodes these women help each other through awkward encounters with peers and love interests, offering perspectives from both sides of the millennial divide. Together, they find a respect and loyalty that neither has experienced before.
